abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column on Los Angeles Galaxy forward Mike Magee, who scored a game-winning playoff goal against his former club New York Red Bulls.
snippet: After a season in which he has already distinguished himself, Mike Magee scored the Galaxy’s game-winning goal against his former club, the Red Bulls, in Sunday’s playoff game.
lead_paragraph: After a season in which he has already distinguished himself, Mike Magee scored the Galaxy’s game-winning goal against his former club, the Red Bulls, in Sunday’s playoff game.

headline.main: Once a Fill-In Keeper, Now a Winning Scorer
headline.print_headline: Once a Fill-In Keeper, Now a Winning Scorer
headline.seo: Galaxy’s Magee Shines Against Red Bulls
